channel.title: How to use *batchs*? Help
channel.description: Well I was wondering if any one could tell me how to use batch files or what ever they are.. in this section theres a post called like batch pranks .. and it has like scripts or what ever for doing different things.. How do I use them? Not THOSE ones in particular.. but how do I USE them or SEND them or INJECT or what ever you do.. if some one could explain it to me or what it is and how to.. that would be awesome .. thanks .. Btw I have no clue how .. my ONLY idea is maybe you copy / paste the script into a file that is opened in Notepad? Then Save and send a program with the injected file and when they open it they get hacked?? Help.. Thanks Snoopy

item.title: How to use *batchs*? Help
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Right click your desktop ->
New -> Text Document
Name it “imanoob.bat”

And then put whatever in there.
Save and double click.
Win.

Read full topic

item.title: How to use *batchs*? Help

item.description:
